content: I've been thinking about the concept of forgiveness and how it relates to my own life. I recently attended a prayer vigil for peace in Ukraine at the cathedral in February, and it really made me think about the importance of forgiveness on a global scale. It was amazing to see people from different faith backgrounds coming together to pray for an end to the conflict. I feel like forgiveness is something we all need to work on, both individually and collectively. What are your thoughts on forgiveness in the context of global conflicts?
